english.segment1: tell me friend. do you linger in your head. can you taste it still like yesterdays. those memories. they wash all over me. they make waves that cry out for all she's seen
english.segment2: all we want will come you see. and all we see will make us be
english.segment3: leave it up to me. i know you're hungry baby. you can't see now. leave it up to me. just close your eyes i'll carry. we'll get there somehow
english.segment4: tell me friend. do you linger in your heart. can you taste it still like yesterdays. those memories. they wash all over me. they make waves that cry out for all she's seen
english.segment5: well all we want will come this see. and all we see will make us be
english.segment6: leave it up to me. i know you're hungry baby. you can't see now. leave it up to me. just close your eyes i'll carry. we'll get there somehow
